text: Alban Lucien Pierson (born 27 December 1972) is a French sport shooter. He participated at the 2018 ISSF World Shooting Championships, winning a medal.25 m team center fire pistol results ==References== ==External links== * Category:Living people Category:1972 births Category:French male sport shooters Category:ISSF pistol shooters
title: Alban Pierson
